snippet: Questions due 14 Oct 2025 1400 EST; proposals due 28 Oct 2025 1400 EST.
Volume I shall not exceed 25 pages in 11 pt font with 1 inch margins.
Technical Factor is more important than Past Performance. Price is least important when differences exist.
Contractor shall provide preventive maintenance for APS-4 equipment within 24 hours of notification.
Firm-Fixed-Price base operations support for 366-day base period (includes 60-day transition).
Key Personnel may not be swapped without CO approval within first 180 days.
